page.title: 13LONGFORGAN - ANTIQUE DEALER-
page.content: This business was started in a country location to take full advantage of the areas central location in relation to Dundee,Perth,Edinburgh and Glasgow. The rural location makes an excellent environment for 'child-raising', and the proximity of Dundee with its many facilities and activities and shopping centres, make this location ideal for our dual purpose needs. Our business has flourished at this location, probably due to the relaxed way of conducting business, allied to easy parking and a generally pleasant environment. The burdens of city rates and planning authorities, and general city life hustle, make a possible move for any trade a real choice and gives the family a lot of scope for outdoor leisure activities, which would not be available in a city environment.
